name: selenium-rs
onCreateCommand: (test -e geckodriver || ( wget https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/download/v0.35.0/geckodriver-v0.35.0-linux32.tar.gz && tar -xf geckodriver-v0.35.0-linux32.tar.gz && rm -rf geckodriver-v0.35.0-linux32.tar.gz ) ) && apt update -y && apt install -y firefox-esr fonts-wqy-microhei && cargo clean && cargo build
